name: Origami.chat
tagline: Find your perfect leads with one prompt
description: Provide a prompt and get your perfect leads. origami.chat has 100+ data sources - use it to find more of your perfect customers, enrich a CSV, or get decision makers. Try it out and get a lead list in seconds!

name: Clawi.ai
tagline: OpenClaw in the Cloud with Zero Setup and on 24/7
description: Stop wrestling with servers. Get your private OpenClaw assistant running in 5 minutes. Works on WhatsApp, Telegram, and Discord while you sleep.

name: Reloop
tagline: Create winning ads without prompts or skills
description: Unlike other AI tools that need you to be a prompting pro, Reloop uses a conversational creative agent. Just chat about your idea, the agent gets your product, suggests a creative plan, and boom, full video generated. No prompts to tweak, no technical settings to mess with. Reloop brings together custom avatars, cloned voices, built-in video editor and auto captions all in one spot. From idea to ad ready to scale in minutes, not days

name: Monologue for iOS
tagline: Turn your voice into polished writing‚Äîwherever you go.
description: Monologue turns your voice into polished writing‚Äîinside the apps you already use. From coding in the terminal to sending a quick message to grandpa, Monologue is the shortest distance between speech and writing. Unlike basic dictation, Monologue doesn't just transcribe. It rewrites, removes filler words, adds punctuation, and adapts to context. Your texts sound like texts. Your emails sound human. Your notes turn into clean lists and structured thoughts.

name: FF Designer
tagline: Generate beautiful UI designs that you can instantly edit
description: AI design tools promise speed but deliver slow outputs, endless re-prompting, and lost momentum. FF Designer generates polished screens in seconds and lets you edit everything visually. No loops, just flow. Download or export, your choice

name: Kollect Voice Agent
tagline: AI that feels human
description: Kollect turns boring forms into real-time AI conversations. Users speak naturally, AI listens and dynamically guides the survey. You can even create forms by simply describing them.

name: HyperCaps for macOS
tagline: Turn CapsLock into a Super Key & Boost Productivity
description: Stop "finger gymnastics" with complex shortcuts! HyperCaps turns your wasted CapsLock key into a macOS productivity superpower. ü™Ñ Core Features: ‚ú® Hyper Key: Hold CapsLock to trigger Cmd+Opt+Ctrl+Shift. üöÄ Vim Mode: Navigate using H/J/K/L without leaving the home row. üß† Smart Tap: Tap for Escape or CapsLock. Native, lightweight (SwiftUI), and privacy-first (zero logging). üéÅ PH Community: Use code PHLAUNCH20 for 20% off lifetime access!

name: Decks For Good
tagline: Get fundraising advice when you give to charity
description: Want to crush your fundraise? Get feedback from investors who've written hundreds of checks and repeat founders with multiple exits. With Decks For Good, you can donate to a vetted nonprofit and get detailed feedback on your fundraising pitch. You might even score an investment! 100% of your donation goes to charity - we don't process payments, all donations are made directly to the nonprofit.

name: AgentReady
tagline: Cut your AI token costs by 40-60% with one API call
description: AgentReady is an API toolkit that makes the web readable for AI agents. Our flagship tool TokenCut compresses text before it hits GPT-4, Claude, or any LLM ‚Äî same meaning, fewer tokens, lower bill. Plus 6 more tools: MD Converter, Sitemap Generator, LLMO Auditor, Structured Data, Robots.txt Analyzer, and Image Proxy. Free during beta. 3 lines of code to integrate.

name: Mengram
tagline: AI memory API with 3 types: facts, events, and workflows
description: AI memory API with 3 types: semantic (facts), episodic (events), and procedural (learned workflows). One API call extracts all three automatically. Killer feature: your agent completes a task ‚Üí Mengram saves the steps ‚Üí next time it already knows the optimal path with success/failure tracking. Works with Claude (MCP), LangChain, CrewAI, OpenClaw. Free, open-source, Apache 2.0.

name: Feedix
tagline: Your YouTube subscriptions, summarized and delivered by AI
description: Too many YouTube subscriptions, too little time. Feedix is built for knowledge-driven channels ‚Äî tech, business, investment. Subscribe to channels, set your schedule (daily or weekly), and get AI summaries delivered to your inbox. Cut through the noise. Get only what matters. - AI extracts key insights from informational videos. - Daily or weekly delivery, on your schedule. - 9 languages supported. - Free tier available. Stop watching everything. Start knowing what matters.

name: Ningenie
tagline: One chat to control all your apps with Agentic AI
description: Ningenie is an agentic AI assistant that connects to the apps you already use and helps you get things done with one command. Instead of switching between Gmail, Calendar, notion, broker apps, and X, just tell Ningenie what you want....in chat or by voice.

name: CertNode Reflex
tagline: AI-powered chargeback defense. Pay only when you win.
description: When a customer disputes a charge, you have 7-21 days to respond or lose the money. Most merchants don't respond or spend hours on weak evidence. Reflex gathers receipts, 3D Secure auth, device fingerprints, and delivery proof, timestamps everything with RFC 3161 cryptographic proof, and submits in under 60 seconds. $0/month. 15% success fee only when you win (vs 25% Chargeflow, 20% Disputifier).

name: isFake.ai
tagline: Detect AI-generated content in video, images, audio, texts
description: Detect AI content across all formats with visual proof. See highlighted suspicious details, get probability scores, and understand why something was flagged. Built by cybersecurity researchers to help you know what's real without bias or regret. For creators, researchers, journalists and brands

name: Yandex AI T√ºrkiye
tagline: A local-first AI super app built for Turkey
description: Yandex AI is a local-first AI super app built for Turkey, designed around real places, real culture, and real daily needs. It combines AI chat, search, and browsing in one simple interface, powered by local insights and local teams.

name: Advertise at the speed of thought
tagline: Run your entire performance marketing by chatting with an AI
description: Stop juggling excel sheets, ad platforms and creative tools. ad-vertly is an autonomous AI agent that runs your entire performance marketing through conversation. Mention your brand ‚Äî it instantly learns your voice, style, and audience. Generates on-brand images & videos ads without any upload. Research competitor ads across ad libraries. Manage Google, Meta, Taboola & Outbrain campaigns in plain English. Just describe what you need and watch it execute.

name: Leewow - AI Product Creation Agent
tagline: From idea to physical product in 30 seconds
description: The world's first Product Creation Agent. Traditional AI stops at the screen. Leewow goes further: describe any idea ‚Üí AI designs it ‚Üí manufactured on-demand ‚Üí shipped globally. In 30 seconds.A custom gift that actually means something. Merch that's uniquely you. Unlike Midjourney (digital only) or Printful (needs a designer), Leewow is fully end-to-end. No design skills needed. Works seamlessly on any device ‚Äî mobile-first, desktop-ready.

name: QuantumComp Webflow Website Template
tagline: Premium Webflow Template for Deep-Tech Brands
description: Launch your technology website in hours, not weeks. QuantumComp is a premium Webflow template built for AI, SaaS, and deep-tech startups. Featuring a clean, minimal design, built-in CMS, and smooth animations, it helps you present complex products with clarity, without needing advanced Webflow skills.

name: AiArtist
tagline: AI motion graphics generator from text prompt
description: Create stunning motion graphics videos with kinetic typography for social posts, ads, reels, shorts, and marketing videos instantly from a text prompt. No video editing skills required.

name: Facts Hero
tagline: Create Visual Fact Cards for Social Media in Seconds
description: Turn any topic into a polished social media image card in seconds. Facts Hero uses AI to write the fact and generate a visual card you can export at 1200 √ó 1200 px and share to LinkedIn, Instagram, and more. Free.
